Class UpAttribute

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--hvtools.UpAttribute
public class UpAttribute
extends java.lang.Object

UpAttribute implements methods to store, geting, setting hvchannels attributes

Version:
1.1 Last update: 17-May-01
